titles.title: To require the specific identification of intelligence construction projects in annual budget submissions and the authorization by law of such projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent).

bill.summary: 8/11/1994--Introduced. Prohibits any intelligence community construction project in excess of $250,000 from being undertaken in a fiscal year unless such project is specifically: (1) identified as a separate item in the President's annual budget submission to the Congress; and (2) authorized by the Congress.
